ComicInfo.Summary: The pulse-pounding return of the original ShadowHawk continues! A masked suicide bomber took out a crowded church while the TV cameras rolled, so how is he now standing in the middle of the hottest nightclub event in the city? Meanwhile, Blacklight wants to know why her best friend is in a coma and why someone else is wearing his costume. If that wasn't enough for our hero, enter: Krimson.

ComicInfo.Title: Resurrection Part 2
